recipes: I have excellent reasons not to contact anyone from my old life. But that might yet change.
Now the Colonel salutes my resolution and my skill. He will vouch for me to his enemy, the Lionsmith.
Now the Lionsmith salutes my valour and my strength. He will vouch for me to his enemy, the Lionsmith.
The Wolf-Divided has marked me for his own. My neck is hot with his stinking breath.

There is a possibility that is not defeat, but neither is it exactly victory. [I can call on an Hour of the Mansus to exalt my duel with the Foe into something eternal - but only if I have fought him to a standstill by dealing him six grievous Wounds]

There is a possibility that is not defeat, but neither is it exactly victory. [If I have seven Defiance Marks, I can call on an Hour of the Mansus to exalt my duel with the Foe into something eternal.]
My Foe already knows exactly where I am.
I've already sent my Foe a weapon.
I could tell them where I am. Or even send them a gift.
My writing on the envelope is crisp and firm. My hand does not shake.
They will be here very soon. Perhaps they already are. [Your Defiance is fiercer now.]
I'll give them a weapon they might use against me. I have my reasons.
Perhaps they'll open the package. Perhaps they'll think it's a trap, and have someone else do it. Will they curse me? Or will they laugh? [Your Defiance is fiercer now.]
I  might need to leave in a hurry. I can prepare the way by sending funds ahead to a possible destination. Of course, if I never go there, the funds will be lost.
I  might need to leave in a hurry. I can prepare the way by sending funds ahead to a possible destination. Of course, if I never go there, the funds will be lost.
It's done. If I need to run, I might have a softer landing.
Once I arrive at this place, I can retrieve the cash I sent ahead.
I should retrieve the cash I sent ahead.
I've sent cash ahead. I can retrieve it once I arrive.

Do I have everything I need? [If you still have Assets worth at least twenty Comfort at the moment you disappear, you'll achieve a greater victory.]
A Life of Peace and Comfort

I'll be safe. Is that enough for me? [If you have Assets worth at least ten Comfort at the moment you disappear, you'll achieve a greater victory.]

@#contact.smuggler| A meeting with M. Giorgiou, the smuggler.
#contact.huntress|A meeting with Chaima, the Snare.
#|U MET A SOMEONE@

@#contact.smuggler| Giorgiou has a plan. There are treasures for the taking in the Chateau Tarrascon.
#contact.huntress|Lalla Chaima's been engaged to kill the Merry Feaster, which lairs in the Aachen sewers, and emerges to eat drunks and soldiers. The French Army doesn't believe it, of course, but there's a sergeant in the Goumiers who knows the work of the Lionsmith when he smells it.
#|--@
Giorgiou wants this business over with.
That could have gone worse, I suppose.
Challa's keen to fulfil her contract
'My Goumier friend's growing anxious. I think he lacks faith in my abilities.'
We clasp hands. [Your Associate is now an Ally. They'll follow you when you leave the city... unless you're headed for a final confrontation.]

@#contact.smuggler|'I owe you this much.'
#contact.huntress|'I'm looking forward to hunting with you.'
#|--@
IMPORTANT - this mutation stops them being removed on departure. The Ally mutation won't protect them from purging, and contact.local isn't a mutation so can't be removed with an xtrigger

@#contact.smuggler|'Onwards to final dissolution, I suppose.'
#contact.huntress|'Let's see about this Foe of yours.'
#|--@
